eu.wauz.wauzdiscord

Class ShiroDiscordBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
      • eu.wauz.wauzdiscord.ShiroDiscordBot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.EventListener

    public class ShiroDiscordBot
extends net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
    The Discord bot running on the server.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Method Detail

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Sets the bot user's status to offline and stops the bot.

      • sendMessageFromMinecraft

        public void sendMessageFromMinecraft(java.lang.String message,
                                     boolean inLogChannel)
        Sends a message that will not be written into the Minecraft chat. The Minecraft prefix prevents infinite loops between Minecraft and Discord.
        Parameters:
        message - The content of the message.
        inLogChannel - If the message should be send to the log channel.

      • sendEmbedFromMinecraft

        public void sendEmbedFromMinecraft(java.lang.String title,
                                   java.awt.Color color,
                                   boolean inLogChannel)
        Sends an embed with custom title and color.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the embed.
        color - The color of the embed.
        inLogChannel - If the message should be send to the log channel.

      • updateLoggingChannelServerStats

        public void updateLoggingChannelServerStats()
        Updates the topic of the logging channel, to display the newest system analytics.
        See Also:
        SystemAnalytics

      • onMessageReceived

        public void onMessageReceived(net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.message.MessageReceivedEvent event)
        Reads a message from Discord and checks if it is a command. Also sends it to the Minecraft chat.
        Overrides:
        onMessageReceived in class net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
        Parameters:
        event - The message event.
        See Also:
        checkForGlobalCommands(String, MessageChannel, boolean)

      • checkForGlobalCommands

        private void checkForGlobalCommands(java.lang.String message,
                                    net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.MessageChannel channel,
                                    boolean isAdmin)
        Checks a message for global commands and executes the found command. If no commands where found, main server commands are checked next.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to check for commands.
        channel - The channel, the command was sent in.
        isAdmin -
        See Also:
        checkForMainServerCommands(String, MessageChannel)

      • checkForMainServerCommands

        private void checkForMainServerCommands(java.lang.String message,
                                        net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.MessageChannel channel)
        Checks a message for main server commands and executes the found command. If no commands where found, music player commands are checked next.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to check for commands.
        channel - The channel, the command was sent in.
        See Also:
        checkForMusicPlayerCommands(String, MessageChannel)

      • checkForMusicPlayerCommands

        private void checkForMusicPlayerCommands(java.lang.String message,
                                         net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.MessageChannel channel)
        Checks a message for music player commands and executes the found command. If no commands where found, fun commands are checked next.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to check for commands.
        channel - The channel, the command was sent in.
        See Also:
        checkForFunCommands(String, MessageChannel)

      • checkForFunCommands

        private void checkForFunCommands(java.lang.String message,
                                 net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.MessageChannel channel)
        Checks a message for fun commands and executes the found command. If no commands where found, the message is ignored.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to check for commands.
        channel - The channel, the command was sent in.

      • isAdmin

        private boolean isAdmin(java.lang.String id)
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of a Discord user.
        Returns:
        If the user is the administrator of the bot instance.
